text: moosa ne kahaah ja tere lie jeevan mein ye hona hai ki too kahata raheh mujhe sparsh na karana[1]. tatha tere lie ek aur[2] vachan hai, jisake virudhd kadaapi na hoga aur apane poojy ko dekh, jisaka pujaaree bana raha, ham avashy use jala denge, phir use uda denge nadee mein choor-choor karake
